message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $135, and I think that's a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $135. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I can do $130, and I think that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm getting a bit frustrated, Bob, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. I'll make one more offer: $129. That's as low as I can go. Take it or leave it.
